pr_title: Map some lunar cycle related logic.

timeline.message: Map some lunar cycle related logic.

timeline.bodyText: I think we've been calling this moon phase before
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+CLASS net/minecraft/class_5424 net/minecraft/world/LunarWorldView
+	METHOD method_30271 getDayTime ()J
+	METHOD method_30272 getMoonSize ()F
+		COMMENT Gets the current size of the moon in the world.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT @return the size of the moon on a scale of {@code 0.0F} to {@code 1.0F}
+	METHOD method_30273 getLunarIndex ()I

replies.bodyText: The texture for the moon's various phases is called moon_phases, so we should definitely use that.
replies.author: haykam821

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change COMMENT

This is typically used to determine the size of the moon that should be renderered. COMMENT

This is typically used to determine the size of the moon that should be rendered.
